name.local: ไปรษณีย์ไทย

metadata.notes:
This database includes major shipping carriers from around the world,
organized by region and type. Each carrier entry includes comprehensive
information about services, capabilities, and coverage areas.

Carrier types include:
- postal: National postal services
- express: Express courier services
- freight: Freight/cargo services
- 3pl/4pl: Third-party/Fourth-party logistics providers
- sea/rail/air: Specialized transport modes
- instant: On-demand/same-day delivery services
